articles.description: The Moon and Mars could be acceptable destinations, but nearby asteroids could also become homes, as a recent study shows.
articles.content:
The stars
 call to us, as Carl Sagan once said. Given the human drive to explore our world and expand our reach, it is likely only a matter of time before we begin to build our homes in the Solar Sy… [+3013 chars]
